definitions.definition: a violation or infringement of a law, agreement, or set of rules.
examples: violation, contravention, breach, transgression, infringement, offense; Moreneglect, dereliction, noncompliance; contumacy "leaving the grounds before noon is an infraction of the rules"Moreneglect, dereliction, noncompliance; contumacy leaving the grounds before noon is an infraction of the rules
